import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from '@auth0/auth0-angular'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar-sidebars', templateUrl: './navbar-sidebars.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar-sidebars.component.scss'] }) export class NavbarSidebarsComponent implements OnInit { constructor(public authService: AuthService) {} ngOnInit(){ } logout() { this.authService.logout(); sessionStorage.removeItem('loggedIn'); } }
